mapping.name: ${province_en}_WORK_NEGROUPBASE_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.templet: 电信四期_网元分组基本信息_LTE.ftl
mapping.sql: select pc.province_name "省份", '%%Y-%%M-%%D' as "时间戳", ng.group_name "网元分组名称", png.group_name "网元分组父节点", ng.level_id "网元级别", '' "备注" from MOD_NEGROUP_GROUP ng left join MOD_NEGROUP_GROUP png on ng.parentid = png.group_id left join CFG_CITY cc on ng.city_id = cc.city_id left join CFG_PROVINCE_CITY pc on cc.city_name = pc.city_name

mapping.name: ${province_en}_WORK_NEGROUPDATA_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.templet: 电信四期_网元分组配置数据_LTE.ftl
mapping.sql: select pc.province_name "省份", '%%Y-%%M-%%D' as "时间戳", ng.group_name "网元分组名称", cc.city_name "所属城市", ne.china_name "网元中文名", pc.province_short_enname || '-' || pc.city_short_enname || '-' || ne.ne_sys_id "网元唯一编号", (CASE ne.Vendor WHEN 'ZY0801' THEN '爱立信' WHEN 'ZY0802' THEN '大唐' WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN '中兴' WHEN 'ZY0807' THEN '诺西' WHEN 'ZY0808' THEN '华为' WHEN 'ZY0810' THEN '阿朗' END) "设备厂家" from MOD_NEGROUP_NE ne left join MOD_NEGROUP_GROUP ng on ne.group_id = ng.group_id left join CFG_CITY cc on ng.city_id = cc.city_id left join CFG_PROVINCE_CITY pc on cc.city_name = pc.city_name
